body_html:
I cloned master, installed and executed the same code (generator rnn). I got 15% of previous speed without cuda.

I found out that CPU load is only 15% while generating. Why isn't pytorch using all cores?

I found out that CPU load is only 15% while generating. Why isn't pytorch using all cores?
body:
I cloned master, installed and executed the same code (generator rnn). I got 15% of previous speed without cuda.

I found out that CPU load is only 15% while generating. Why isn't pytorch using all cores?
